ability.Thick Fat: Fire-/Ice-type attacks against this Pokemon deal halved damage.
ability.Heavy Sleeper: While asleep, this Pokemon regenerates 1/8 of its maximum HP at the end of each turn.

Rest.effect: The user goes to sleep, fully restoring HP and status.

Snore.effect: Only usable if asleep. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Body Slam.effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

Giga Impact.effect: The user cannot act next turn, unless the target faints.

Sleep Talk.effect: The user randomly uses one of its known moves while asleep.
